verses.t: Would to God{G3785} ye could bear{G430} with me{G3450} a little{G3397} in{G3588} my folly{G877}: and{G235} indeed{G2532} bear{G430} with me{G3450}.

For{G1063} I am jealous{G2206} over you{G5209} with godly{G2316} jealousy{G2205}: for{G1063} I have espoused{G718} you{G5209} to one{G1520} husband{G435}, that I may present{G3936} you as a chaste{G53} virgin{G3933} to Christ{G3588}.

But{G1161} I fear{G5399}, lest by any means{G3381}, as{G5613} the serpent{G3588} beguiled{G1818} Eve{G2096} through{G1722} his{G846} subtilty{G3588}, so{G3779} your{G5216} minds{G3588} should be corrupted{G5351} from{G575} the simplicity{G3588} that is{G3588} in{G1519} Christ{G3588}.

For{G1063} if{G1487} he{G3588} that cometh{G2064} preacheth{G2784} another{G243} Jesus{G2424}, whom{G3739} we have{G2784} not{G3756} preached{G2784}, or{G2228} if ye receive{G2983} another{G2087} spirit{G4151}, which{G3739} ye have not{G3756} received{G2983}, or{G2228} another{G2087} gospel{G2098}, which{G3739} ye have{G1209} not{G3756} accepted{G1209}, ye might{G430} well{G2573} bear with{G430} him.
For{G1063} I suppose{G3049} I was{G5302} not{G3367} a whit behind{G5302} the very{G5228} chiefest{G3029} apostles{G652}.

But{G1161} though{G1487} I be rude{G2399} in speech{G3588}, yet{G235} not{G3756} in knowledge{G3588}; but{G235} we have been{G5319} throughly{G1722} made{G3956} manifest{G5319} among{G1519} you{G5209} in{G1722} all things{G3956}.

Have{G2228} I committed{G4160} an offence{G266} in abasing{G5013} myself{G1683} that{G2443} ye{G5210} might be exalted{G5312}, because{G3754} I have preached{G2097} to you{G5213} the gospel{G2098} of God{G3588} freely{G1432}?
I robbed{G4813} other{G243} churches{G1577}, taking{G2983} wages{G3800} of them, to do{G4314} you{G5216} service{G1248}.

And{G2532} when I was present{G3918} with{G4314} you{G5209}, and{G2532} wanted{G5302}, I was chargeable to{G2655} no{G3756} man{G3762}: for{G1063} that which was lacking{G5303} to me{G3450} the brethren{G3588} which came{G2064} from{G575} Macedonia{G3109} supplied{G4322}: and{G2532} in{G1722} all{G3956} things I have kept{G5083} myself{G1683} from being burdensome{G4} unto you{G5213}, and{G2532} so will I keep{G5083} myself.
As{G3754} the truth{G225} of Christ{G5547} is{G2076} in{G1722} me{G1698}, no man{G3756} shall stop{G4972} me{G1691} of this{G3778} boasting{G3588} in{G1722} the regions{G3588} of Achaia{G3588}.
Wherefore{G1223}? because{G3754} I love{G25} you{G5209} not{G3756}? God{G3588} knoweth{G1492}.

But{G1161} what{G3739} I do{G4160}, that I will do{G4160}, that{G2443} I may cut off{G1581} occasion{G3588} from them{G3588} which desire{G2309} occasion{G874}; that{G2443} wherein{G3739} they glory{G2744}, they may be found{G2147} even{G2532} as{G2531} we{G2249}.
For{G1063} such{G5108} are false apostles{G5570}, deceitful{G1386} workers{G2040}, transforming themselves{G3345} into{G1519} the apostles{G652} of Christ{G5547}.
And{G2532} no{G3756} marvel{G2298}; for{G1063} Satan{G3588} himself{G846} is transformed{G3345} into{G1519} an angel{G32} of light{G5457}.

Therefore{G3767} it is no{G3756} great thing{G3173} if{G1487} his{G846} ministers{G3588} also{G2532} be transformed{G3345} as{G5613} the ministers{G1249} of righteousness{G1343}; whose{G3739} end{G3588} shall be{G2071} according to{G2596} their{G846}works{G3588}.

I say{G3004} again{G3825}, Let{G1380} no{G3361} man{G5100} think{G1380} me{G3165} a fool{G878}; if{G1487} otherwise{G1161}, yet{G2579} as{G5613} a fool{G878} receive{G1209} me{G3165}, that{G2443} I may boast myself{G2744} a little{G3397}.
That which{G3739} I speak{G2980}, I speak{G2980} it not{G3756} after{G2596} the Lord{G2962}, but{G235} as it were{G5613} foolishly{G877}, in{G1722} this{G3778} confidence{G3588} of boasting{G3588}.
Seeing that{G1893} many{G4183} glory{G2744} after{G2596} the flesh{G3588}, I{G2504} will glory{G2744} also{G2504}.
For{G1063} ye suffer{G430} fools{G878} gladly{G2234}, seeing ye{G5607} yourselves are wise{G5429}.

For{G1063} ye suffer{G430}, if{G1487} a man{G5100} bring{G2615} you{G5209} into bondage{G2615}, if{G1487} a man{G5100} devour{G2719} you, if{G1487} a man{G5100} take{G2983} of you, if{G1487} a man{G5100} exalt himself{G1869}, if{G1487} a man{G5100} smite{G1194} you{G5209} on{G1519} the face{G4383}.

I speak{G3004} as concerning{G2596} reproach{G819}, as{G5613} though{G3754} we{G2249} had been weak{G770}. Howbeit{G1161} whereinsoever{G3739} any{G5100} is bold{G5111}, (I speak{G3004} foolishly{G877},) I{G2504} am bold{G5111} also{G2504}.
Are they{G1526} Hebrews{G1445}? so{G2504} am I{G2504}. Are they{G1526} Israelites{G2475}? so{G2504} am I{G2504}. Are they{G1526} the seed{G4690} of Abraham{G11}? so{G2504} am I{G2504}.

Are they{G1526} ministers{G1249} of Christ{G5547}? (I{G1473} speak{G2980} as a fool{G3912}) I{G5228} am more{G5228}; in{G1722} labours{G2873} more abundant{G4056}, in{G1722} stripes{G4127} above measure{G5234}, in{G1722} prisons{G5438} more frequent{G4056}, in{G1722} deaths{G2288} oft{G4178}.
Of{G5259} the Jews{G2453} five times{G3999} received I{G2983} forty{G5062} stripes save{G3844} one{G1520}.
Thrice{G5151} was I beaten with rods{G4463}, once{G530} was I stoned{G3034}, thrice{G5151} I suffered shipwreck{G3489}, a night and a day{G3574} I have been{G4160} in{G1722} the deep{G3588};

In journeyings{G3597} often{G4178}, in perils{G2794} of waters{G4215}, in perils{G2794} of robbers{G3027}, in perils{G2794} by{G1537} mine own countrymen{G1085}, in perils{G2794} by{G1537} the heathen{G1484}, in perils{G2794} in{G1722} the city{G4172}, in perils{G2794} in{G1722} the wilderness{G2047}, in perils{G2794} in{G1722} the sea{G2281}, in perils{G2794} among{G1722} false brethren{G5569};

In{G1722} weariness{G2873} and{G2532} painfulness{G3449}, in{G1722} watchings{G70} often{G4178}, in{G1722} hunger{G3042} and{G2532} thirst{G1373}, in{G1722} fastings{G3521} often{G4178}, in{G1722} cold{G5592} and{G2532} nakedness{G1132}.
Beside{G5565} those things that are without{G3924}, that which cometh{G3588} upon me{G3450} daily{G2250}, the care{G3588} of all{G3956} the churches{G3588}.
Who{G5101} is weak{G770}and{G2532} I am{G770} not{G3756} weak{G770}? who{G5101} is offended{G4624}, and{G2532} I{G1473} burn{G4448} not{G3756}?
If{G1487} I must needs{G1163} glory{G2744}, I will glory{G2744} of the things{G3588} which concern mine{G3450} infirmities{G3588}.

The God{G3588} and{G2532} Father{G3962} of our{G2257} Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, which is{G5607} blessed{G2128} for{G1519} evermore{G3588}, knoweth{G1492} that{G3754} I lie{G5574} not{G3756}.

In{G1722} Damascus{G1154} the governor{G3588} under Aretas{G702} the king{G3588} kept{G5432} the city{G4172} of the Damascenes{G1153} with a garrison{G5432}, desirous{G2309} to apprehend{G4084} me{G3165}:
And{G2532} through{G1223} a window{G2376} in{G1722} a basket{G4553} was I let down{G5465} by{G1223} the wall{G3588}, and{G2532} escaped{G1628} his{G846} hands{G3588}.
